last_episode_to_air.name: Moled Over
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the Pinnoquinox in Golden Brain's hands, the brave kids of Mission Critical must storm S.W.A.M.P. HQ to retrieve the serum by force.

name: Spy Kids: Mission Critical
overview: In this animated spinoff series, Juni and Carmen Cortez must battle the evil organization S.W.A.M.P. -- without the help of their super-spy parents.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In this animated spinoff series, Juni and Carmen Cortez must battle the evil organization S.W.A.M.P. -- without the help of their super-spy parents.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Mission Critical kids take their fight inside the academy when a mole sent by Golden Brain seeks to retrieve the all-powerful Pinnoquinox serum.

episodes.name: Mission Critical
episodes.overview: After the OSS is compromised, Gregorio reboots the Spy Academy to train his kids and other junior spies to counter Golden Brain's heinous plans.

episodes.name: School Dazed
episodes.overview: Carmen and Juni must learn to manage the daily rigors of Spy Academy life ... or face the possibility of being expelled!

episodes.name: Songs in the Key of Pain
episodes.overview: With S.W.A.M.P.'s diabolical plans thwarted, Golden Brain enlists musical mischief maker DJ Otto Tune to lure the spy kids out of the academy.

episodes.name: Desert-ed
episodes.overview: After detecting S.W.A.M.P. activity, two rivals must put aside their differences to keep the rest of Mission Critical from walking into an evil trap.

episodes.name: Frenemies for Life
episodes.overview: The Mission Critical kids must prove their worth when a rival group within the Academy threatens to take their place as the top team.

episodes.name: And Scene!
episodes.overview: When the spy kids confront Spurious Visage, they discover that his former student has gone rogue and reappeared as a S.W.A.M.P. agent.

episodes.name: Inner-Childlike Behavior
episodes.overview: An embarrassed Scorpion threatens to leave the Spy Academy when her TV star father, Fegan Floop, decides to join their faculty.

episodes.name: The Vinyl Countdown
episodes.overview: Mint Condition, PSI's favorite street artist, takes the inventor under his wing, asking him to help design a new industrial art installation.

episodes.name: Off the Grid
episodes.overview: Team leaders Carmen and Juni must pass a difficult midterm exam known as the Mind-Bender -- or once again face expulsion from the Spy Academy.

episodes.name: The Cookie Crumbles
episodes.overview: Finally feeling like a real team, the Mission Critical kids face their toughest test as they set out to destroy Golden Brain's lair once and for all.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In this animated spinoff series, Juni and Carmen Cortez must battle the evil organization S.W.A.M.P. -- without the help of their super-spy parents.

episodes.name: Secrets & Spies
episodes.overview: With his mole in need of a diversion, Golden Brain turns his tech guy into a living computer virus to destroy the academy mainframe.

episodes.name: Heavy Meddle
episodes.overview: A cash-strapped Golden Brain sends heavy metal rocker Death Meddle to break into the treasury with his destructive, high-frequency vocals.

episodes.name: Thumb Kind of Wonderful
episodes.overview: Carmen is so superstitious that she's convinced she's jinxed herself! Meanwhile, Golden Brain seeks a formula for his mole to complete a mission.

episodes.name: Ace Off
episodes.overview: Ace looks for plastic surgeon Dr. Jericho, fearing he'll lose his title as the face of a spy magazine. But Golden Brain has other plans for the doctor.

episodes.name: Stakeout Burrito
episodes.overview: Carmen and Scorpion must learn to set aside their distrust for each other when a meeting between Golden Brain and the mole gets intercepted.

episodes.name: Pale Blue-Eyed Rider
episodes.overview: After receiving an alleged message from her crush, Carmen heads to the desert, where a trap laid by S.W.A.M.P. awaits.

episodes.name: Home Sick
episodes.overview: While Mission Critical screens the faculty using a high-tech lie detection system, Juni's sent to retrieve a secret file from the old O.S.S. HQ.

episodes.name: Flip-Flooped
episodes.overview: When the team's latest plan to unmask Agent No-One leads to them seeing Fegan Floop sneak into their quarters during a fake assembly staged by Sir Awesome, 4/6 of Mission Critical suspect him of being the traitor.

episodes.name: Family Unfriendly
episodes.overview: The Cortezes come to the academy for the Battle of the Best Spy Family. But Juni's worried his father will reveal the creator of the Pinnoquinox serum!

episodes.name: Moled Over
episodes.overview: With the Pinnoquinox in Golden Brain's hands, the brave kids of Mission Critical must storm S.W.A.M.P. HQ to retrieve the serum by force.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The Mission Critical kids take their fight inside the academy when a mole sent by Golden Brain seeks to retrieve the all-powerful Pinnoquinox serum.
